background_description: The background depicts a forest scene with blurred dark green foliage, brown tree trunks, and dappled sunlight creating shadows. There are visible patches of lighter green vegetation on the forest floor.
explanation: The white wolf is clearly visible and stands out against the dark, earthy tones of the forest background. Its light-colored fur provides very low color and texture similarity with the brown tree bark and green foliage, resulting in a high contrast difference. While white fur would offer excellent camouflage in a snowy environment, it offers no camouflage in this specific forest setting.
